Hardware Computer Engineer Job at Coniah Systems Support Limited




        
    

        
        Coniah Systems Support Limited is a technology company with expertise in hardware management, networking solutions and software innovations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Hardware Computer Engineer

Job Location: Allen, Ikeja - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
You will be expected to perform the following function:
     

            
    




	Manage and monitor all installed systems and infrastructure including printers & photocopiers
	Provide supports for network users
	Install, configure, test and maintain operating systems, application software and system management tools
	Setup and manage the messaging and collaborating system for enterprise use
	Proactively ensure the highest levels of systems and infrastructure availability
	Monitor and test application performance for potential bottlenecks, identify possible solutions and work with developer’s vendors to implement those fixes
	Maintain security, backup, and redundancy strategies
	Provide 2nd level support for Microsoft Exchange users
	Liaise with vendors and other IT personnel for problem resolution.


Requirements


	Certificate in Networking (Cisco, CCNA, CCNP etc.), Microsoft Certification (MCITP) etc.
	At least 2 years of related experience.
	Hands-on experience in computer systems installation, maintenance and troubleshooting
	Hands-on experience in managing active directory domain services
	Hands-on experience on various Microsoft Windows operating systems
	Hands-on experience in managing Microsoft exchange servers
	Good knowledge of data network
	Excellent written, presentation and interpersonal communication skills
	Strong analytical and presentation skills with attention to detail
	Excellent team working skills
	Ability to work with minimal supervision
	Ability to deliver tasks with a very tight deadline.
	Ability to install and configure Local Area Network.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitmentcssl@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only qualified candidates will be shortlisted.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Facility Manager",
  "description": "Rome Business School Nigeria is a premier managerial training and research institution committed to delivering world-class education that blends international standards with local relevance. Our mission is to bridge the gap between academic theory and industry practice through market-oriented, ethical, and human-centered programs designed for professionals, entrepreneurs, and executives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facility Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	We are seeking an experienced, hands-on Facility Manager to oversee the effective operation, maintenance, and management of organizational facilities.
	The role is responsible for ensuring a safe, functional, reliable, and conducive working and learning environment through proper generator management, equipment maintenance, asset control, utilities management, and safety compliance, while supporting uninterrupted business or academic operations.


Job Description


	Facility Operations &amp; Conducive Environment:&nbsp;Ensure facilities are clean, safe, well-maintained, and conducive for work, learning, and operations.
	Generator &amp; Power Systems Management:&nbsp;Manage all power infrastructure, including:
